affiliation.ce:source-text: Department of Mathematics, Amrita School of Physical Sciences, Coimbatore, Amrita Vishwa Vidhyapeetham, India

head.citation-title: Continuous and discrete quaternion linear canonical wave packet transform
head.abstracts: © 2022 Elsevier GmbHIn this paper, we widen the domain of wave packet transform and linear canonical wave packet transform to the quaternion algebra. We prove certain properties of the quaternionic wave packet transform and quaternionic linear canonical wave packet transform. The reconstruction formula and Parseval's relation for the introduced transforms are proved. Some examples of these transforms are discussed. We present an equivalent uncertainty principle as Heisenberg uncertainty principle for QLCWPT. We have introduced the discrete QLCWPT for application in image filtering. We have given the methodology of the application and then demonstrated it using an example.

grant-text.$: This work is supported by the Science and Engineering Research Board (SERB) under the core research grant scheme from the Department of Science and Technology, India (File No. CRG/2018/002491). The corresponding author is the recipient of this project.

copyright.$: Copyright 2022 Elsevier B.V., All rights reserved.
